title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
description: Group dialog is not being displayed when no dataset is set.
OB: The error message is shown when the group dialog should be displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether or not a dataset is set.
SR:
1. Open the application without setting a dataset.
2. Navigate to the group dialog.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed.
